0011101001101000 0011110111111000 1 -> sum: 0111100001100001, cout: 0
1000000100010111 1000010110011011 0 -> sum: 0000011010110010, cout: 1
0010111000011000 0011000111011101 0 -> sum: 0101111111110101, cout: 0
0010011100000001 0101110001001110 0 -> sum: 1000001101001111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
